item.title: What've i done wrong
item.dc:creator: @the_wanderer The Wanderer
item.description:
@the_wanderer wrote:

I believe the issue is that you are trying to do something like this:
String.requestForceChat2(“blahblah”);

It needs to be other.
At least, I believe. I’m tired so my thinking process is a bit obscure.

Read full topic

item.title: What've i done wrong
item.dc:creator: @go_armand go armand
item.description:
@go_armand wrote:

HIYA

Could someone please explain why this isn’t compiling correctly.
i want to be able to make people do an emote and say ‘oh no i’m drunk again’ when i type ::drunk (name).

if (p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("fdfds") || p.username.equalsIgnoreCase("blankwank")){ if (cmd[0].equalsIgnoreCase("drunk")) { String victim = playerCommand.substring((playerCommand.indexOf(" ") + 1)); Player other = Server.engine.players[Engine.getIdFromName(victim)]; victim.requestAnim(2770, 0); victim.requestForceChat2("Oh no, i'm drunk again"); } }

these are my compiling errors
